unnormalised: The gig economy presents both opportunities and challenges for HR in India. While offering flexibility & access to a wider talent pool (e.g., developers in Bangalore), managing compliance (PF, ESI) & ensuring fair compensation (Rs.) can be complex. Upskilling, especially in areas like AI, is crucial. We need robust frameworks for gig workers' well-being and development, similar to Dr. Sharma's suggestions for talent management at IIM Ahmedabad. Considering office space needs, factoring in fluctuating headcount impacts cost per sq ft.
